title: HARO Writer needed to build quality backlinks
job_overview:
hello, I need a part time HARO link builder writer to help build up my website back links. This will be an ongoing position for the right candidate.

position will pay $3 per hour + $3 per submitted article
and $15 bonus per accepted article to do-follow high quality links.

need the best writer fluent in English writing and use correct grammar.

Need you to submit articles to HARO, Quoted, and many others.
